Cosmology

Cosmology of Pannotia

Inner Planes

Name Alternative Name(s) Alignment Description Notable native inhabitants
Plane of Dust — — Earth & Air —
Plane of Embers — — Fire & Wood —
Plane of Ice — — Air & Water —
Plane of Magma — — Fire & Earth —
Plane of Ooze — — Earth & Water —
Plane of Smoke — — Air & Fire —

Name Alternative Name(s) Alignment Description Notable native inhabitants
Plane of Ash — CE Fire & Negative —
Plane of Blood — NE Blood —
Plane of Decay — NE Wood & Negative
  • Hecate Viridian - God of undead
Plane of Diamonds — NG Earth & Positive —
Plane of Lightning — CG Air & Positive —
Plane of Radiance — LG Fire & Positive —
Plane of Salt — N Water & Negative —
Plane of Sand — CN Earth & Negative —
Plane of Steam — LN Water & Positive —
Plane of Vacuum — LE Air & Negative —
Plane of Vigor — NG Wood & Positive —

Outer Planes

Outer Planes
Name Alternative Name(s) Alignment Description Notable native inhabitants
Aardurana Evergreen Woods NG/CG The plane of idealized nature.
  • Aerayan Gilanthel
  • Animal Lords - paragon versions of many animal species
  • Tralia Bellae
Aphea The Arena CN/CG The eternal battleground where true heroes prove their valor.
  • Ilraeth Gilanthel - God of Fire
  • Tholk Dangeth - God of Rogues
  • Volen Rodench - God of Strength
Baerfenna The Living Hills NG/LG Gnomes and other industrious folk dwell here.
  • Wanfiddle Garrick
Batal'ha The Infernal Battlefield LN/LE A plane of constant, pointless war, where identity is forever lost.
  • Imshar Thokka
  • Randar Delaco
Cymatosia Plane of Anarchy CE/CN An infinite network of pitch-black catacombs, with winds that drive men mad.
  • Baelthenal Blissemon - Lord of Hatred
Empyrean Peaks The Ascending Heavens, The Cathedrals of Light LG This is the final resting place for many of those who walk the path of righteousness.
  • Angels and Devas
  • Jerolin Liam Zareh
  • Bombuj Dankil
Hettiken The Plane of the Unfeeling LN This clockwork plane is the ultimate in order; scholars and constructs live here.
  • Modrons, orderly geometrically-shaped beings
  • Formians, warlike ant-like beings
  • Inevitables, mechanical enforcers of all law
Kohadon The Nine Hells LE The ultimate home of dictatorship, torment and devilish plots.
  • Devils - mortal enemies of the Demons
Mandrillia The Hills of Song CG Fey realm of passion, abundance and nature's caprice. —
Nexus, The The Plane of Separation N The plane between all other outer planes.
  • Ruler of the Center City
  • Keilantra Celnotte - Goddess of Magic
Oblivion Plane of Bedlam CN An alien, anarchistic and unpredictable plane.
  • Slaad - frog-like creatures
  • Githzerai - human-like monks
Ruggien Plane of Blight NE/LE Volcanic realm of evil schemes and merciless cliffs.
  • Yugoloths (Daemons)
Seharu Divine Arcadia NG The plane of peace and unadulterated goodness.
  • Arana Lutesong - Goddess of Song
  • Guardinals - noble immortal humanoids with bestial features
Solitude Plane of the Irredeemable NE Here, all emotion and compassion is drained away, until only hopelessness, selfishness and apathy remain. —
Utopia The Land of Perfect Order LN/LG A peaceful place where all live in harmony; consequently, it is quite dull.
  • Keth Durgan - The Healing Palm, God of Monks
Verratar Plane of Betrayal NE/CE Liars, cheats and traitors are imprisoned here by their own deceptions. —
Void, The The Unending Waste CE Evil lands of shocking perversity and unpredictable horror.
  • Demons - Mortal enemies of the Devils
  • Alauniida Fil'orzza
